content.raw:
Yes, that include.

defroBook-Pro:ros_catkin_ws DeFrenZ$ brew list
assimp			freeimage		jpeg			opencv			sip
atk			freetype		lame			pango			sox
autoconf		fuse4x			libffi			pcre			sphinx
automake		fuse4x-kext		libmpc			pixman			sqlite
bison			gdbm			libogg			pkg-config		szip
boost			gdk-pixbuf		libpng			poco			tango-icon-theme
cairo			gettext			libtar			protobuf		tbb
cloog			gfortran		libtiff			protobuf-c		texi2html
cmake			glib			libtool			pyqt			theora
cminpack		gmp			libusb			pyqwt			tinyxml
cmu-pocketsphinx	gtest			libvorbis		pyside			uuid
cmu-sphinxbase		gtk+			libyaml			python			vtk
collada-dom		harfbuzz		libzzip			qhull			x264
cppunit			hdf5			log4cxx			qt			xvid
doxygen			icon-naming-utils	mad			qwt			xz
eigen			icu4c			mpfr			readline		yaml-cpp-0.3
faac			imagemagick		mysql			sdformat		yasm
ffmpeg			intltool		mysql-connector-c	sdl
flann			isl			ntfs-3g			sdl_image
fontconfig		jasper			ogre			shiboken

from the errors in the build I can say that the problem is, as I already said, it tries to include an opcode.h from python instead of the right one
content.html:
Yes, that include.

defroBook-Pro:ros_catkin_ws DeFrenZ$ brew list assimp freeimage jpeg opencv sip atk freetype lame pango sox autoconf fuse4x libffi pcre sphinx automake fuse4x-kext libmpc pixman sqlite bison gdbm libogg pkg-config szip boost gdk-pixbuf libpng poco tango-icon-theme cairo gettext libtar protobuf tbb cloog gfortran libtiff protobuf-c texi2html cmake glib libtool pyqt theora cminpack gmp libusb pyqwt tinyxml cmu-pocketsphinx gtest libvorbis pyside uuid cmu-sphinxbase gtk+ libyaml python vtk collada-dom harfbuzz libzzip qhull x264 cppunit hdf5 log4cxx qt xvid doxygen icon-naming-utils mad qwt xz eigen icu4c mpfr readline yaml-cpp-0.3 faac imagemagick mysql sdformat yasm ffmpeg intltool mysql-connector-c sdl flann isl ntfs-3g sdl_image fontconfig jasper ogre shiboken

from the errors in the build I can say that the problem is, as I already said, it tries to include an opcode.h from python instead of the right one
